abstract.p: John Marchese, chairman at 141 Integrated Communications North America, is resigning to start his own marketing consulting company; his management duties will be handled in the interim by Ed Aroyan; William E Hooper is named chairman at Trahan, Burden & Charles, succeeding Robert Matz, who resigned (Advertising column) (S)

block.p: * John Marchese, chairman at 141 Integrated Communications North America, New York, is resigning, the agency said, to start his own marketing consulting company. His management duties will be handled in the interim by Ed Aroyan, executive vice president for account management at Bates USA, New York. Bates USA and 141 Worldwide are both part of the Bates Worldwide division of the Cordiant Communications Group. * William E. Hooper was named chairman at Trahan, Burden & Charles, Baltimore, succeeding Robert Matz, who left. Mr. Hooper had been an independent marketing communications consultant in Baltimore.
